titles.title: A bill to provide for certain water resources development activities of the Corps of Engineers, and for other purposes.
A bill to provide for certain water resources development activities of the Corps of Engineers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: This bill requires the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to (1) provide offsets against Louisiana's cost-share obligations under the Greater New Orleans Hurricane and Storm Damage Risk Reduction System for certain work performed by Louisiana; and (2) determine whether the flood control project for the Red River below Denison Dam should incorporate the Cherokee Park Levee in Caddo Parish, Louisiana.
